name: Tattis
description:
Tattis is a 2D platformer about a mushroom that is trying to find bright place to grow. It was developed for Quick Jam #1 Light by indie developer TurhaArpa. Feel free to give suggestions and feedback. This game was made in limited time so there might be bugs.

Bug Warning!

!!If the camera goes too up stop playing on fullscreen and respawn!!

!!Dash rooms floor doesn't show but you can still jump there!!

Controls:

Mouse/Keyboard

WASD/Arrows for moving.

Space to jump.

Shift to dash.

R to respawn.

Escape to open menu.

Controller:

(Might differ on different controllers)

Left Joystick to move.

East/(South) button to jump.

South/(East) button to dash.

North button to respawn.

Options to open menu.
